title: wedding font

comments.content: [Scriptina](http://web.archive.org/web/20051122170606/http:/dafont.com/en/font.php?file=scriptina&page=1&nb_ppp_old=10&text=Celebration&nb_ppp=10&classt=alpha) - one of the better _free_ fonts available.
